description:
Windows Prometheus monitors the Kanban display, adds the resource summary display, and optimizes the detailed display. The update supports windows_exporter 0.13.0.

THIS IS ONLY A TRANSLATION. CREDITS TO StarsL.cn

source dashboard ID 10467

panels.title: Resource overview (associated JOB item) currently selected host: [$show_hostname] instance: $instance
